prompt:
Job Category Level One: Mobile Development
Job Category Level Two: Web, Mobile & Software Dev
Description: Software Engineer needed for new App creation. Looking for a Full Stack Developer 
Providing services to users and ensuring seamless consumer experience on the app.
Engagement: 

###
completion:
Hi there - I can help build your app that meets your features and functionality requirements.

I'm a veteran full-stack engineer specializing in building web and mobile apps, including AI-integrated software development solutions using design and programming methodologies emphasizing performance and maintainability. 

My team and I have built and published numerous apps on the App Store and Google Play stores using React Native for cross-platform development. We've faced and resolved various challenges related to privacy policies, terms, descriptions, screenshots, app features, and testing logins. 

We specialize in providing end-to-end web and mobile app development services across various industries, leveraging the latest open-source tools and libraries to build scalable, modular applications that can be deployed within a quick turnaround time. Our comprehensive product development services cover everything from DevOps and backend to frontend and launch support. We will provide the type of support, deliverables, and quality you need in an outsourced partner for your project.

Our solutions are tailored to simplify complex processes and improve user engagement, as demonstrated by our recent project for a startup that reduced its development costs by 30%. We are committed to building beautiful products, both on the outside and underneath the hood. 

Our project management approach ensures effortless collaboration between you, the project managers, and our development team, using the Jira tool to track tasks, bugs, and sprints. We can also use this tool to discuss planning, track features, and alert when features are ready to be tested, providing transparency throughout the project lifecycle.

Get to know me and my team in the links below:
Personal website: https://alexnordlinger.com/
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/alex-nordlinger/
Reviews: https://clutch.co/profile/materialize

We structure our process into 4 defined phases, tailoring our solution to your specific project, budget, and timing needs. No commitments are necessary to the subsequent phases, as we take each step independently.

- Phase 1: Scoping $5k (1-3 weeks)
- Phase 2: Design $7.5k+ (2-4 weeks)
- Phase 3: Development/Launch $20k+ (1+ months)
- Phase 4: Maintenance $2-5k/mo.

If you're interested in working with us, please schedule a call with me at your convenience using the following link: https://calendly.com/materialize-labs/alex-nordlinger-upwork.

During our call, we can discuss your project requirements in more detail and provide you with a detailed approach and pricing. I look forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards,
Alex END

prompt:
Job Category Level One: Web Development
Job Category Level Two: Web, Mobile & Software Dev
Description: We are seeking an experienced freelance web developer to create a user-friendly website that generates custom CrossFit workouts based on user-specific equipment and preferences. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in web development and a passion for fitness or experience working on fitness-related projects.

Responsibilities:

Collaborate with our team to understand project requirements and create a detailed project plan.
Design and develop a responsive, mobile-friendly website using modern web technologies and frameworks.
Integrate the ChatGPT API to generate custom workouts based on user inputs and preferences.
Create a user-friendly interface that allows users to input their available equipment and fitness levels.
Implement a secure user authentication system to enable personalized workout recommendations and store user preferences.
Ensure the website is scalable and optimized for performance, with a focus on maintaining fast response times.
Test the website thoroughly to ensure compatibility across different devices and browsers.
Address any technical issues or bugs that may arise during the development process.
Provide ongoing support for website updates and maintenance as needed.
Requirements:

Proven experience in web development, with a strong portfolio showcasing relevant projects.
Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and experience working with modern web frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, Vue.js).
Familiarity with API integration, specifically with the ChatGPT API, is a plus.
Experience building responsive, mobile-friendly websites.
Knowledge of best practices for website performance optimization and cross-browser compatibility.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with our team.
A passion for fitness or experience working on fitness-related projects is a plus.
Engagement: 3 to 6 months

###
completion:
Hi there,

With my extensive experience (16 years +) building fully scalable and custom web and mobile apps, including AI-integrated software development solutions, I can absolutely create a high-performant and user-friendly website that generates custom CrossFit workouts based on user-specific equipment and preferences. My team and I have trained models using the GPT-4 language model and leveraged the OpenAI API to create numerous integrations for organizations across various industries.

We excel in providing end-to-end web and mobile app development services, employing the latest open-source tools and libraries to build scalable, modular applications within a quick turnaround. Our comprehensive product development services span from DevOps and backend to frontend and launch support, ensuring we deliver the support, deliverables, and quality you expect from an outsourced partner.

We work with AI-related projects to automate data and report generation, streamlining their operations and reducing manual workload. By strategically combining fixed templates, dynamic data, and AI-generated content, we build automated solutions that significantly improve the application’s performance and overall efficiency of operations. We can discuss more of our approach over a quick call.

Our tailored solutions simplify complex processes and elevate user engagement. In one recent project, we helped a startup reduce its development costs by 30%. Our commitment to building visually appealing and efficient products matches our dedication to fostering seamless collaboration between all parties. We achieve this through the Jira tool, which we use to track tasks, bugs, and sprints, ensuring complete transparency throughout the project lifecycle.

Please find links to familiarize yourself with me and my team further:

- Company website: https://materializelabs.com/

prompt:
Job Category Level One: Web Development
Job Category Level Two: Web, Mobile & Software Dev
Description: We are seeking software development services for our existing RESTful real estate API written in NodeJS/Express with a MySQL database and S3-compatible object storage. Caching operations for rental and sales data occur on a schedule through batch processing but may sometimes fail. We need a developer to update the API to store caching metrics for batch jobs and implement new endpoints for administrators to query the metrics and trigger caching re-runs.

For this project, we require the following deliverables:

1. Integration of data storage for generating caching metrics for batch jobs.
2. Implementation of administrative API endpoints for pulling data and running on-demand caching operations.
    a. The implementation must recognize the rate limits of each provider and warn of possible violation.

The requirements for the developer are:

1. Experience working with NodeJS/Express, relational databases, and object storage.
2. Familiarity with multi-client architectures.
3. A continuous learner who is open to both teaching and learning.

We look forward to receiving your proposal.
